title: Sri Lanka still trying to forget over 300 attacks by LTTE in 30 years
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Some organizations are trying to remember a solitary incident that took place in 1983 but unrepeated since to continuously project and promote a larger objective. They take great pains to ‘remember’ this solitary incident but refuse or ignore to hold a single exhibition, documentary or issue a statement…
